name: universal-js

scripts.build:dev: npm run tidy && npm run build:dev:client && npm run build:dev:server && npm run createStatic:dev
scripts.build:pro: npm run tidy && npm run build:pro:client && npm run build:pro:server && npm run createStatic:pro
scripts.createStatic:dev: npm run createStaticJs:dev && npm run createStaticCss:dev
scripts.createStatic:pro: npm run createStaticJs:pro && npm run createStaticCss:pro
scripts.createStaticCss:dev: mkdir -p ./static/css && cat ./src/common/config/index.json | json development.styles | json -ga | xargs -I % cp % ./static/css/
scripts.createStaticCss:pro: mkdir -p ./static/css && cat ./src/common/config/index.json | json production.styles | json -ga | xargs -I % cp % ./static/css/
scripts.createStaticJs:dev: mkdir -p ./static/js && cp ./dist/client.js.map ./static/js/ && cat ./src/common/config/index.json | json development.scripts | json -ga file | xargs -I % cp % ./static/js/
scripts.createStaticJs:pro: mkdir -p ./static/js && cat ./src/common/config/index.json | json production.scripts | json -ga file | xargs -I % cp % ./static/js/
